summary: Foxes are medium-sized mammals related to dogs and wolves. They have a unique appearance with a flat skull, pointy ears, and a long, fluffy tail. There are around 37 species of foxes, and they live on every continent except Antarctica. The red fox is the most common, with many different subspecies. Foxes are known for their cleverness and are often featured in stories and legends worldwide. People have enjoyed hunting foxes with dogs, a tradition that started in Europe, for many years.
title: Fox
